name: Matchicon
description:
A simple yet addictive puzzle game! With 5 levels of play, the game is easy to learn, but challenging to master.
With a clean & modern game interface, Matchicon™ provides hours of game play without a lot of unnecessary fluff.

If you are like me, you hate ads. There are no ads in Matchicon™. No additional, "in-game" purchases required. One low price for hours of game play without the nuisance of advertising, add-ins or power-ups.

Matchicon™ was built for travellers and commuters! That's because it doesn't require an internet connection to register high scores or get additional game data.
You can play it completely disconnected in an airplane without any impact to game play.
